title: SpaceX appeals FCC decision to reverse $885.5M Starlink subsidies
summary: SpaceX appealed the Federal Communications Commission’s reversal of Starlink’s infrastructure award of $885.5 million. The appeal was filed electronically and hand-delivered to...

title: SeaDream Yacht Club first boutique travel line to deploy Starlink
summary: The SeaDream Yacht Club became the first boutique travel line to debut Starlink, the company announced in a press release, adding that...

title: Report: Ligado’s wireless network will interfere with Iridium and some GPS services
summary: An independent review of Ligado’s planned deployment of a terrestrial wireless network concluded that it will likely interfere with GPS signals and with space-based communications services provided by Iridium.

title: Maritime Launch Services breaks ground on Canada’s first orbital launch site
summary: Maritime Launch Services (MLS) in Canada has received approval to begin construction of Spaceport Nova Scotia within the framework of an Environmental Assessment approved in 2019.

title: HawkEye 360 plans new funding round as it positions to go public
summary: HawkEye 360 is looking at a new round of funding, and possibly going public in a couple of years, CEO John Serafini said Sept. 8.
